reviews.text: Its unpleasant after dark , the lighting outside the station should be improved to stop the present behaviour. Another stabbing 4pm 5/4/19. The staff are helpful.

COMMUTER BEWARE. Ilford station may offer excellent transport links to both Essex and Central London; so why you may rightly ask the one-star review.  Two Words: PUBLIC SAFETY.  Upon exiting the station  you will frequently see groups of insalubrious individuals gathered outside either aggressively begging or blatantly indulging in shall we say somewhat more nefarious activities.  This intolerable situation recently culminated with a British Transport Police Officer being stabbed by one of these “over represented” criminal elements.  Thankfully, this brave Police Officers injuries are non-life threatening.  UPDATE: A young man has been knifed to death outside Ilford station shortly before 9pm on Tuesday night 26th February 2019.
Staff is helpful at Ilford Station
